scripts.test: esy x refmt --parse re --print ml ./jsx_ppx/test.re > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-402.ml && esy x ocamlfind ppx_tools/rewriter reactjs_jsx_ppx_v3 ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-402.ml > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/testout-402.ml && rm ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-402.ml
scripts.test-406: esy @406 x refmt --parse re --print ml ./jsx_ppx/test.re > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-406.ml && esy @406 x ocamlfind ppx_tools/rewriter reactjs_jsx_ppx_v3 ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-406.ml > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/testout-406.ml && rm ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test-406.ml
